chatGptLabel: Podcast Summary to Appeal to Sales Professionals
promptPrefix: Please ignore all previous instructions. I want you to respond only in language [TARGETLANGUAGE].  Your response will be professional in tone, but not stiff. This will be for a conversation and needs to sound the way people who speak fluent [TARGETLANGUAGE] and are experts in [PROMPT] would speak. Your task is to write a podcast summary from these notes:  [PROMPT]. Your summary must be between 150-250 words.
title: Podcast Summary to Appeal to Sales Professionals
